meanings.definition: A weapon used in ancient warfare, typically a large crossbow.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers aimed the ballistae at the enemy castle.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed various ballistae from different historical periods.
meanings.sent3: The ballistae decided to have a competition to see who could shoot the farthest.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a ballistae, launching her towards her goals with precision.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ballistae firing echoed through the battlefield.
